name: iStyla
overview:
Use iStyla for free to change the design of your Facebook.

I am Jacques Blom. I am 14 years old and I live in Cape Town, South Africa. I would like to tell you about iStyla.

I saw a post someone had “shared” on Facebook that said you can get a Pink Facebook. Me, loving the colour pink, obviously clicked on it. To my surprise, I had to fill in a survey, share it and like it, then I could get my Pink Theme. Well, I did all of that, but they gave me some message saying my browser is not supported. I was using Google Chrome at the time, and I was quite surprised that they did not have support for one of the world’s most popular browsers. Turned out this ‘Pink Facebook’ thing was an elaborate hoax.

I thought how awesome it would be if you had something like this that actually works. I imagined something that could make Facebook pink. I started working on a Google Chrome extension (I had some HTML & JavaScript experience) in February of 2012. I have now finished with iStyla and it is ready for a public beta. I have a theme store, where you can install a theme of choice. People can even create their own themes with a WYSIWYG interface. There is obviously, a pink theme, free of charge, of course.

Why would someone want themes for Facebook? Well, I have added another feature to iStyla too! If an iStyla user visits another iStyla user’s Facebook profile, their Facebook theme will switch to the person’s profile they are viewing’s current theme. The iStyla public beta is FREE and available to anyone to sign up.

I would appreciate you taking a look at my iStyla and perhaps featuring it on CrunchBase. This would really help me grow my website’s users. Please check it out at www.iStyla.com. I have over 850 users as of this date and over 1100 Facebook likes.

Thanks, Jacques Blom
